ygData.msgSnippet: I was in PAW some levels and i build in there a faction with karana residents enough and fast making much money (all that for lv 12 to 14) ... Silverion
ygData.messageBody:
I was in PAW some levels and i build in there a faction with karana
residents enough and fast making much money (all that for lv 12 to 14)


At 10.17 28/06/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
>Okay,
>
>The Bearhide Armor looks like kick-butt armor for low/medium level wizards.
> Baobob will make me everything but the cloak. Chanda keeps getting killed
>before I talk to her, but I assume I'll run into
>the same problem. How do I raise my faction with these guys so that they
>will make me all the pieces of armor? The say I need to help there family
>in the Karanas. I've talked to Mom, Pop, Jr, the
>Gnoll, and Tiny but have recieved no leeds on helping them.
>
>Thanks in Advance.
>Malkin
